response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we believe its true worth is $1,000,000. However, considering your specific needs and the value you place on it, we are willing to negotiate. We kindly invite you to consider purchasing the product at a special introductory price of $920,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially be worth much more in the future. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 920000}
